home.subText: I build things for the web
home.introText: I'm a software engineer based in Vadodara, India specializing in the building and sometimes designing pixel-perfect, high-quality websites and applications.

about.title: About me
about.mainContent: Hi, I'm Harsh Shah from Vadodara, India; a software developer with four years of experience who loves building & designing stuff that lives on the internet, whether that will be a web application, extensions, websites, or in between. I enjoy solving complex problems in simple ways.
about.subContent: I've completed a Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology from SVIT (Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Technology) located in Gujarat, India.

panels.label: Few technologies and tools I've been working with
Where I've worked
panels.content: I'm currently working as a Front-end Designer in Odysseus Solutions from Dec 2018. Earlier, I was working as a Web Producer with Investis Digital for two and a half years where I have started my career in 2016.

panels.label: Things I do when I'm not coding
panels.content: I like traveling, clicking random things, and making sketches. Heavy metal and acoustic rock are my tastes in music.
